title: Spawning External Processes in Go (Challenge)
description: In some cases, Go programs need to spawn non-Go processes. This challenge aims to demonstrate how to spawn external processes in Go.

meta.title: Spawning External Processes in Go (Challenge)
meta.description: Learn how to spawn external processes and collect their output in Go programming language.
meta.keywords: process output, process spawning, go, programming tutorial, go labs, go playground online, external processes, go lab, go practice
